description: Product of differences between consecutive positive divisors of n.
comments: Row products of triangle A193829, if n >= 2. - _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 31 2011When p is prime a(p) = p-1. - _Michel Marcus_, May 15 2014
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a057449 = product . a193829_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 23 2013(PARI) a(n) = {my(d = divisors(n)); prod(i=1, #d-1, d[i+1] - d[i]);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 15 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Sep 25 2000
